abstract: A Sunday grid by Elizabeth C. Gorski can be considered a puzzler’s best friend.
snippet: A Sunday grid by Elizabeth C. Gorski can be considered a puzzler’s best friend.
lead_paragraph: SUNDAY’S PUZZLE — All together now: “Awwwww!” You cannot be sad doing this puzzle by Elizabeth C. Gorski, the mistress of visual puzzle art. Sorry, it’s not allowed. Even if you’re not a dog lover, you have to admit that this puzzle is pretty awesome. We’ve got an adorable pup drawn in the grid, and Ms. Gorski has managed to do that without even going over the 140 entry limit. That’s masterful in itself.
